DATABASE.HEADING: metacollect is an open data service that provides up-to-date information about civil society projects.

PART_1.HEADING: Find
PART_1.PARAGRAPH: Our database provides a flexible fulltext search over all project metadata, the project's description, contact person, address and many more fields. Results can be further filtered by project categories.

PART_2.HEADING: Manage
PART_2.PARAGRAPH: If your project information was already entered by our editors, sign up for an account and take charge of your information. Any updates you make will immediately be visible on all partner platforms. If your project is unknown to us thus far, please sign up and create a profile.

PART_3.HEADING: Integrate
PART_3.PARAGRAPH: Are you interested in a comprehensive data repository of refugee project metadata? Connect to our open API and freely use all the information and present them with your particular focus. Please read the details of how to consume our API and don't hesitate to get in touch if you would like to discuss our data model or talk about how we can adapt the interface to serve your needs. Our software is open source, too, so of course you can work on changes as well!

VISION.HEADING: Vision
VISION.PARAGRAPH_1: We want to strengthen all players in the refugee sector by providing a central repository of information that can reveal synergies between formerly disparate projects and allows everyone to cearly communicate their needs in terms of project support. This is a community effort that grows in power the more stakeholders partake.

BENEFITS.HEADING: Advantages
BENEFITS.LINE_1: As a project initiative you give out information about your project and communicate your needs.
BENEFITS.LINE_2: Your entry will be distributed automatically to different overview platforms.
BENEFITS.LINE_3: You keep your information up to date in a central location, keep control over them and concentrate on your daily work.
BENEFITS.LINE_4: As an overview platform you integrate updated information consecutively by implementing an API once.
BENEFITS.LINE_5: This way, you can concentrate on a thematic core area.

ASSOCIATES.HEADING: Our current partnerships
ASSOCIATES.PARAGRAPH_1: RefugeeBoard is an Online platform which offers an overview over current projects, contact persons, helpful Links und addresses around the topic "Arriving in Germany" and supports support seekers and support offerers to get in contact quick and directly.
ASSOCIATES.PARAGRAPH_2: InfoCompass is an information and communication platform for newcomers, refugees and asylum seeking people and supporters in Berlin. Aim of the platform ist to distribute informations and offers for refugees and supporters in multi languages in the internet but also in place in the shelters. This should make reaching out to the different target groups much more effective.

INTERFACE.HEADING: Interface (API)
INTERFACE.PARAGRAPH_1: We have implemented an API using the Django framework that can communicate via JSON, YAML, or XML. The details can be found in the following document. If you need support implementing the API for your site or want to make suggestions to improve the API, please contact our team of developers.
INTERFACE.PARAGRAPH_2: The data are distributed under the Open Database License whose terms and conditions are explained in an understandable manner in the following document.
